info.name: fold-core
info.summary: Timeseries modelling on a rolling/expanding window basis.

info.name: fold-core
info.summary: A Time Series Cross-Validation library that lets you build, deploy and update composite models easily. An order of magnitude speed-up, combined with flexibility and rigour.

info.author: Mark Aron Szulyovszky
info.name: fold-core
info.summary: A Time Series Cross-Validation library that lets you build, deploy and update composite models easily. An order of magnitude speed-up, combined with flexibility and rigour.
